targets.query:
from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tripsElectric" or r["_field"] == "tripsTotal")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with tripsMixed: r.tripsTotal - r.tripsElectric}))

from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "electricEnergyConsumedTotal" or r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedTotal")

panels.title: Electricity Consumption - Car Display vs. Real Consumption

targets.query:
from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedElectric" or r["_field"] == "mileageElectricChargeCycles"or r["_field"] == "electricityPrice")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with consumptionNormCost: r.electricityPrice * 100.0 * r.electricEnergyChargedElectric / float(v: r.mileageElectricChargeCycles)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["electricEnergyChargedElectric", "mileageElectricChargeCycles", "electricityPrice"])

from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mileageElectric" or r["_field"] == "mileageTotal")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with mileageMixed: r.mileageTotal - r.mileageElectric}))

from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedElectric" or r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedTotal")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with electricEnergyChargedMixed: r.electricEnergyChargedTotal - r.electricEnergyChargedElectric}))

from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedElectric" or r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedTotal" or r["_field"] == "mileageElectricChargeCycles" or r["_field"] == "mileageTotal" or r["_field"] == "fuelConsumed" or r["_field"] == "fuelPrice")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with mileageMixed: r.mileageTotal - r.mileageElectricChargeCycles}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with electricEnergyChargedMixed: r.electricEnergyChargedTotal - r.electricEnergyChargedElectric}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with consumptionNorm: 100.0 * r.electricEnergyChargedElectric / float(v: r.mileageElectricChargeCycles)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with mileageMixedEl: 100.0 * r.electricEnergyChargedMixed / r.consumptionNorm}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with mileageMixedRed: float(v: r.mileageMixed) - r.mileageMixedEl}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with fuelConsumptionNormCost: r.fuelPrice * 100.0 * r.fuelConsumed / r.mileageMixedRed}))
  |> drop(columns: ["electricEnergyChargedElectric", "electricEnergyChargedTotal", "mileageElectricChargeCycles", "mileageTotal", "fuelConsumed", "mileageMixed", "electricEnergyChargedMixed", "consumptionNorm", "mileageMixedEl", "mileageMixedRed", "fuelPrice"])

from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "traveltimeElectric" or r["_field"] == "traveltimeTotal")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with traveltimeMixed: r.traveltimeTotal - r.traveltimeElectric}))

from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedElectric" or r["_field"] == "electricEnergyConsumedElectricChargeCycles" or r["_field"] == "mileageElectricChargeCycles")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with consumptionNorm: 100.0 * r.electricEnergyChargedElectric / float(v: r.mileageElectricChargeCycles)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with consumptionDisp: 100.0 * r.electricEnergyConsumedElectricChargeCycles / float(v: r.mileageElectricChargeCycles)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["electricEnergyChargedElectric", "mileageElectricChargeCycles", "electricEnergyConsumedElectricChargeCycles"])

from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedTotal" or r["_field"] == "fuelConsumed" or r["_field"] == "fuelPrice" or r["_field"] == "electricityPrice")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with costElectricity: r.electricEnergyChargedTotal * r.electricityPrice}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with costFuel: r.fuelConsumed * r.fuelPrice}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with costTotal: r.costElectricity + r.costFuel}))
  |> drop(columns: ["electricEnergyChargedTotal", "fuelConsumed", "fuelPrice", "electricityPrice"])

from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fuelConsumed")

from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedElectric" or r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedTotal" or r["_field"] == "mileageElectricChargeCycles" or r["_field"] == "mileageTotal"or r["_field"] == "fuelConsumed")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with mileageMixed: r.mileageTotal - r.mileageElectricChargeCycles}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with electricEnergyChargedMixed: r.electricEnergyChargedTotal - r.electricEnergyChargedElectric}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with consumptionNorm: 100.0 * r.electricEnergyChargedElectric / float(v: r.mileageElectricChargeCycles)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with mileageMixedEl: 100.0 * r.electricEnergyChargedMixed / r.consumptionNorm}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with mileageMixedRed: float(v: r.mileageMixed) - r.mileageMixedEl}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with fuelConsumptionNorm: 100.0 * r.fuelConsumed / r.mileageMixedRed}))
  |> drop(columns: ["electricEnergyChargedElectric", "electricEnergyChargedTotal", "mileageElectricChargeCycles", "mileageTotal", "fuelConsumed", "mileageMixed", "electricEnergyChargedMixed", "consumptionNorm", "mileageMixedEl", "mileageMixedRed"])

panels.title: Fuel Consumption / 100 km (from mixed trips without electric part)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "Car_Monthly")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vin"] == "$car_vin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedElectric" or r["_field"] == "electricEnergyChargedTotal" or r["_field"] == "mileageElectricChargeCycles" or r["_field"] == "mileageTotal"or r["_field"] == "fuelConsumed")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with mileageMixed: r.mileageTotal - r.mileageElectricChargeCycles}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with electricEnergyChargedMixed: r.electricEnergyChargedTotal - r.electricEnergyChargedElectric}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with consumptionNorm: 100.0 * r.electricEnergyChargedElectric / float(v: r.mileageElectricChargeCycles)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with mileageMixedEl: 100.0 * r.electricEnergyChargedMixed / r.consumptionNorm}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with mileageMixedRed: float(v: r.mileageMixed) - r.mileageMixedEl}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with fuelConsumptionNorm: 100.0 * r.fuelConsumed / r.mileageMixedRed}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with fuelSaved: r.fuelConsumptionNorm * float(v: r.mileageTotal) / 100.0 - r.fuelConsumed}))
  |> drop(columns: ["electricEnergyChargedElectric", "electricEnergyChargedTotal", "mileageElectricChargeCycles", "mileageTotal", "fuelConsumed", "mileageMixed", "electricEnergyChargedMixed", "consumptionNorm", "mileageMixedEl", "mileageMixedRed", "fuelConsumptionNorm"])
